licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) Licence applies to this document.

This licence applies to this TEI-XML document which is the transformed result work from a previous LaTEX format file out of the synoptic diplomatic edition of the complete poemes of Ausiàs March in all its witnesses.
The licence was added on May 1, 2019.

msIdentifier.repository: Biblioteca Virtual Lluís Vives - Cervantes Virtual

editorialDecl.p: This a TEI-XML adaptation out of the LaTEX version of Ausiàs March's poems' synoptic edition, from all witnesses.

lg.l: ¶ Per moltamor don gran desig sengendra
Sper vinent ꝑper tots aquests grahons
No son delits mas donen passions
Lapor del mal qujm fa morir tan tendra
E portalcor sens fum continuu foch
E la color nom surt apart de fora
Socoreume dins los termens dun ora
Car mos seyals demostren viure poch
¶ Metie sient no te lo cas per goch
Com la calor so surt apart defora extrema
Lignorant veu que lo malalt no crema
E jutgel sa pusque mostra bon toch
Lo pacient no pora dir son mall
Tot afeblit ablengua mal diserta
Gests e color asats fan descuberta
Part del afany que tant com lo dir val
¶ Plena de seny dir uos quęqueus> amb no cal
Puys crech de cert quęqueus ne teniu ꝑper certa
Si beus mostrau quęqueus esta molt cuberta
Cella per quj amor es desegual
